transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello, Prity mam?
Executive: Yes mam.
Customer: Good morning mam, Harshita this side from IndiaMART. Okay, good morning mam. Yes mam. Yes mam. So mam you messaged me regarding there is some urgent help you need?
Customer: Ha mam actually hua ye tha ki na main IndiaMART pe na aise products add kar rahi thi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Okay aur na matlab mujhe ye sab cheeze nahi aati to main thodi si uske andar panic ho gayi thi. To na apne aap matlab maine kuch bhi nahi kiya tha na kahi mera touch hua tha apne aap na wo log out ho gaya tha.
Executive: Okay. To fir ab aapne log. Hanji ha main wahi wahi cheeze aapko bata rahi hu. To us time pe maine kya kiya jo office wala number hai na maine isse login karna start kar diya. Mujhe laga wo sab sahi kar lenge. Kyunki match jab aayi thi na ye already sir tak bani hui thi ID ye IndiaMART pe. Kyunki mujhe abhi ek hi mahina hua hai ye. To mujhe ye nahi pata tha ki sir ka number registered hai. To maine is number se na dalna jaise maine login karna start kiya to mujhe aisa laga ki ek naya number registered ho gaya usme. Ek nayi ID ban gayi.
Customer: Oh aur matlab thoda bas yahi mujhe aapse confirm karna tha ki mam uski kaun sa number registered agar aap mujhe bata do. To wo fir ho gaya tha sir se baat ki to fir sir ne bola ki mera number registered hai.
Executive: Ha mam hamesha aapko jab bhi aapko IndiaMART ka account login karna hoga kisi bhi like jo aapne phone mein to aapko jo aapka primary number sir ka number hai usi se hi login kar sakte hai. Se bhi nahi sirf usi se kar sakte hai. To baad me ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ho ho to gaya tha login lekin usse pehle jo maine office wale number se kiya tha na. To usse matlab mujhe na kafi calls aur matlab ek disturbance ho raha tha kyunki ab naya number enter hua hai to sabko lag raha tha ki ha inko kuch search karna hai. To na mujhe ek ye bhi tha ki jaise ye matlab to mera jo bhi aisa na ho ki jo mera bhi is is office wale number se jo bana ek account open hua hai ye mujhe matlab deactivate karana hai to ye kaise hoga. To thoda bas yahi tha. To ek koi mam the matlab wo mujhe naam nahi unka yaad. Pooja shayad aisa kuch tha unka IndiaMART se unka call aaya tha. To fir maine unhe sari situation jo bhi thi maine unhe bata di thi.
Executive: To aapka ye issue resolve ho gaya tha mam?
Customer: To ye abhi kya hai calls to nahi aa rahe us din to kafi aa rahe the matlab ek ke baad ek ek ke baad continue calls aaye ja rahe the. To maine unko yahi bola tha ki mam jo mera aap please aisa karna kyunki wo same name se ho gaya dono. To aisa na ho ki aap deactivate ya jo bhi aapka rehta hai wo karne mein matlab aap jo main wala hamara wo kar do. Ye nahi karna.
Executive: Mam mere ko aap ek minute dijiye aap call pe rahiye mujhe ek minute dijiye main isko discuss karke aapko abhi main iska resolution batati hu. Dekh lo agar aapko mam lag raha hai kyunki abhi aisa koi calls nahi aa rahe agar koi aisa issue nahi hai uske rehne se bhi to bhi matlab.
Customer: Mujhe koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Ha so mam mujhe one minute dijiye please. Ha theek hai aap kar lijiye. Ji. Okay mam.

Executive: Okay so mam aap abhi panch minute ke video meet pe aa sakte hai usko main delete karwa dungi aapka wo jisse ki agar future mein bhi wo koi issue nahi rahega aapke liye.
Customer: Ha theek hai. Matlab jo abhi hamara recently usse to kuch aisa farak nahi padega na?
Executive: Nahi nahi matlab jo hai ki aapko. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ha but ye jo hai isko delete karwana hi better rahega kyunki uske baad calls wagera karaenge to usko aapko hi problem nahi hogi.
Executive: To aap dekh lijiyega kyunki usme itne koi products wagera kuch hai bhi nahi to aap ek bar dekh lijiyega ki same name ki wajah se nahi dusra na ho jaye.
Customer: Ha to isliye main aapko mam jo hai video meet ka link send kar rahi hu aapke whatsapp par join kariye main usko delete karwa deti hu.
Executive: Theek hai okay okay mam thank you. Ek minute mam.

Executive: Mam check kariye maine aapko link send kiya hai video meet ka.
Customer: Ek second. Yeah.
Customer: To ye link se mujhe kya karna hoga?
Executive: Yes mam. Hello. Yes mam matlab join karna hai mujhe?
Customer: Hanji jaise hum video meet pe connect karte hai waise connect kariye jisse ki main aapki screen share karwaun.
Customer: Okay theek hai ek second.

Customer: To baat aap abhi call ke through karoge ya matlab zoom meet se. Ji na?
Customer: Abhi aap matlab baat kaise karoge call ke through karoge ya fir. Nahi nahi video meet pe hi karenge mam.
Customer: Okay theek hai fir aap kar lijiye ek bar main karti hu.
Executive: Okay. Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer accidentally created duplicate account.

- Wants to deactivate the duplicate account.

- Concerned about calls on the new number.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to delete duplicate account.

- Executive sent a video meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join video meet to delete account.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- duplicate account, deactivation, video meet, calls
